## AbstractDevice.createTexture2DArrayFromImages() method

Creates a 2d array texture from a seris of image elements

**Signature:**

```typescript
createTexture2DArrayFromImages(elements: TextureImageElement[], sRGB: boolean, options?: TextureCreationOptions): Texture2DArray;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  elements | [TextureImageElement](doc/markdown/./device.textureimageelement.md)<!-- -->\[\] | image elements |
|  sRGB | boolean |  |
|  options | [TextureCreationOptions](doc/markdown/./device.texturecreationoptions.md) | _(Optional)_ The creation options |

**Returns:**

[Texture2DArray](doc/markdown/./device.texture2darray.md)

## Remarks

image elements must have the same size.
